messages.message: FYI, I don’t know who owns `prometheus` but we aren’t able to deploy it to azure sandboxes from master for the past few days. Here’s an example of a failure: https://jenkins.instabase.com/job/deploy-service/440124/
Hey Naveen you can post to <#C01DJ7QDC2H|> . I am away atm, if you have logs to share that will be great
Can you paste in the errors, i am jot at the laptop atm

```error: deployment "deployment-prometheus-server" exceeded its progress deadline
00:14:37.913  make: *** [/home/ib-build/workspace/deploy-service@2/third-party/docker/monitoring-ib/prometheus/../../../../shared-utils/build-utils/shared/sandbox.mk:227: status-dep-sandbox-azure] Error 1```
Hmm okay this is the status check that’s failed. Do you see the deployment created on your sandbox? What does the describe for the pod/deployment say?
Mmm, unfortunately I have already redeployed the prometheus from the last stable release. I am deploying again now so I’ll let you know what the `describe deployment` says when this one fails
Okay let me know if you face issues here

I see this
```ts=2022-04-29T18:58:09.132Z caller=manager.go:967 level=error component="rule manager" msg="loading groups failed" err="/etc/config/alerting_rules.yml: yaml: line 135: did not find expected key"
ts=2022-04-29T18:58:09.132Z caller=manager.go:967 level=error component="rule manager" msg="loading groups failed" err="/etc/config/alerting_rules.yml: yaml: line 135: did not find expected key"
ts=2022-04-29T18:58:09.132Z caller=main.go:1155 level=error msg="Failed to apply configuration" err="error loading rules, previous rule set restored"```

and this
```ts=2022-04-29T18:58:09.136Z caller=main.go:1064 level=error err="error loading config from \"/etc/config/prometheus.yml\": one or more errors occurred while applying the new configuration (--config.file=\"/etc/config/prometheus.yml\")"```
